name: -webkit-column-break-before
description: Determines whether a column break can and should occur before an element in a multicolumn flow layout.

values.always: A column break is always inserted before the element.
values.auto: A right column break is inserted before the element where appropriate.
values.avoid: Column breaks are avoided before the element.
values.left: A left column break is inserted before the element.
values.right: A right column break is inserted before the element.
